Description: For sale is a beautiful 2005 Music Man JP6 (John Petrucci signature) electric guitar in graphite pearl with matching color headstock. One of the most versatile guitars ever made. Loaded with a Dimarzio D-sonic humbucking pickup in the bridge and a Dimarzio custom wound humbucker in the neck. Comes with one of the greatest floating tremolo systems ever made and has the best tuning stability out of any guitar I've ever owned. I've gone a year without playing it and it would still be in tune when I picked it up. Has a piezo pickup system in the tremolo with both stereo and mono output jacks for utilizing the piezo system. Piezo is operated by a 9V battery. Has a basswood body that is light and has an awesome tone.Gorgeous birdseye maple neck with rosewood fretboard. Mother of pearl shield inlays with a cool JP inlay at the 1st fret. Great locking schaller tuning pegs for rock solid tuning stability.All electronics have always worked perfectly.Brand new set of .10 strings just put on.***Cosmetically the body has minor dents and a chip in the paint on the left side of the guitar, also has a miniscule hairline crack in the paint just under the middle control knob. I tried to capture them in the pictures the best that I could. If you need to see more pictures I would be glad to provide them, just let me know what you would like to see. The rest of the guitar is near mint condition*** All the blemishes listed above are cosmetic in nature and do not affect the playability, function and sound of the guitar. If you are someone that is not bothered by a few cosmetic imperfections this is the guitar for you at a steal of a price!Sale is for GUITAR ONLY and NO hard shell case is included but will ship securely and well packaged. Ships to continuous United States only.Thanks for looking!
Title: Ernie Ball Music Man John Petrucci JP6 2005 Guitar w/ Piezo in Graphite Pearl
